knimeNode.name: Boolean Widget
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a boolean widget for use in components views. Outputs an integer flow variable with a given value (boolean).

intro.p: Creates a boolean widget for use in components views. Outputs an integer flow variable with a given value (boolean).

The node supports custom CSS styling. You can simply put CSS rules into a single string and set it as a flow variable 'customCSS' in the node configuration dialog. You will find the list of available classes and their description on our documentation page.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in the view.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the view, for instance by means of a tooltip.
The value that is selected by default.
If set, the output variable will be of type integer (as opposed to type boolean).

knimeNode.interactiveView: Displays a checkbox which represents the boolean value.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
